doc:
Violet Hopson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violet_Hopson 0 Violet Hopson (16 December 1887 – 21 July 1973) was an actress and producer who achieved fame on the British stage and in British silent films. She was born Elma Kate Victoria Karkeek in Port Augusta, South Australia on 16 December 1887. Violet Hopson was her stage name, while in childhood she was known as Kate or Kitty to her family. Violet_Hopson ( 16_December_1887 – 21_July_1973 ) was an_actress_and_producer who achieved fame on the_British_stage and in British_silent_films . She was_born Elma_Kate_Victoria_Karkeek in Port_Augusta , South_Australia on 16_December_1887 . Violet_Hopson was her_stage_name , while in childhood she was_known as Kate_or_Kitty to her_family .
